DTMod:AbstractDTCard.NAME: AbstractDTCard
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I don't have Dragon on my side.

DTMod:HardSkin.NAME: Hard Skin
DTMod:HardSkin.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Dragon gains !DT:THB! Block. NL Exhaust.

DTMod:SwitchingTactic.NAME: Switching Tactic
DTMod:SwitchingTactic.DESCRIPTION: Reverse ragontaer:Aggro. NL This turn, ALL enemies lose Strength equal to ragontaer:Aggro difference.
DTMod:SwitchingTactic.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Reverse ragontaer:Aggro. NL This turn, ALL enemies lose Strength equal to ragontaer:Aggro difference.

DTMod:RunningTactic.NAME: Running Tactic
DTMod:RunningTactic.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL You gain 2 ragontaer:Aggro.

DTMod:Prediction.NAME: Prediction
DTMod:Prediction.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card from your draw pile and put it on top. NL It costs 0 until played.

DTMod:ForbiddenStrike.NAME: Forbidden Strike
DTMod:ForbiddenStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Can be Upgraded any number of times. NL []You can only Smith this card at Rest Sites.

DTMod:OpeningTactic.NAME: Opening Tactic
DTMod:OpeningTactic.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL If the enemy has full HP, Gain !M! Dexterity. NL Deal !D! damage.

DTMod:TacticRecycle.NAME: Tactic Recycle
DTMod:TacticRecycle.DESCRIPTION: Fetch !M! card from your exhaust pile. (Except Tactic Recycle) NL Exhaust.
DTMod:TacticRecycle.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Fetch !M! cards from your exhaust pile. (Except Tactic Recycle) NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Fetch !M! card from your exhaust pile and Retain it. (Except Tactic Recycle) NL Exhaust.
Fetch !M! cards from your exhaust pile and Retain them. (Except Tactic Recycle) NL Exhaust.

DTMod:HeadStart.NAME: Head Start
DTMod:HeadStart.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Scry !M!. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

DTMod:CleansingStrike.NAME: Cleansing Strike
DTMod:CleansingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust !M! random Status or Curse card from anywhere.
DTMod:CleansingStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust !M! random Status or Curse cards from anywhere.

DTMod:Training.NAME: Training
DTMod:Training.DESCRIPTION: You and Dragon gain !M! Strength each. NL Gain 1 ragontaer:Bonding.

DTMod:CalculatedDefense.NAME: Calculated Defense
DTMod:CalculatedDefense.DESCRIPTION: Weakened enemies deal !M! less damage to your team.

DTMod:ExcessFootwork.NAME: Excess Footwork
DTMod:ExcessFootwork.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Dexterity. NL At the end of each turn, lose 1 Dexterity.

DTMod:PreemptiveStrike.NAME: Preemptive Strike
DTMod:PreemptiveStrike.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy 3 times. NL Exhaust.

DTMod:ComboAttack.NAME: Combo Attack
DTMod:ComboAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Dragon deals !DT:THD! damage. NL Gain 1 ragontaer:Bonding.

DTMod:BreakAttack.NAME: Break Attack
DTMod:BreakAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Exhaust.

DTMod:BuildUp.NAME: Build Up
DTMod:BuildUp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Next Attack card deals !M! additional damage.

DTMod:Outburst.NAME: Outburst
DTMod:Outburst.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E]. NL Dragon enters Wrath for 2 turns.

DTMod:RepeatStrike.NAME: Repeat Strike
DTMod:RepeatStrike.DESCRIPTION: Dragon deals !DT:THD! damage. At the start of each turn, return this from the discard pile to your hand.
DTMod:RepeatStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Dragon deals !DT:THD! damage. At the start of each turn, return this from the discard pile to your hand.

DTMod:FireUp.NAME: Fire Up
DTMod:FireUp.DESCRIPTION: Dragon gains NL !M! Strength and NL 1 Dexterity.

DTMod:FireBreath.NAME: Fire Breath
DTMod:FireBreath.DESCRIPTION: Dragon deals NL !DT:THD! damage to ALL enemies.

DTMod:ShieldDrain.NAME: Shield Drain
DTMod:ShieldDrain.DESCRIPTION: Steal all Block from the enemy. NL Deal !D! damage.

DTMod:LowKick.NAME: Low Kick
DTMod:LowKick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw cards equal to the amount of Weak on the enemy.

DTMod:Punisher.NAME: Punisher
DTMod:Punisher.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the enemy has Weak, deal !D! damage again.

DTMod:Adaptation.NAME: Adaptation
DTMod:Adaptation.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you shuffle your deck, put ALL Innate cards into your hand.

DTMod:MasterPlan.NAME: Master Plan
DTMod:MasterPlan.DESCRIPTION: Dragon gains !DT:THB! Block. NL Next turn, You gain NL !B! Block.

DTMod:QuickFly.NAME: Quick Fly
DTMod:QuickFly.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Dragon deals NL !DT:THD! damage. NL Draw a card.

DTMod:Feint.NAME: Feint
DTMod:Feint.DESCRIPTION: Randomly chosen: You deal !D! damage or Dragon deals !DT:THD! damage.

DTMod:BlazingStrike.NAME: Blazing Strike
DTMod:BlazingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Dragon deals NL !DT:THD! damage. NL Add a Burn into your hand.

DTMod:HeatWave.NAME: Heat Wave
DTMod:HeatWave.DESCRIPTION: Dragon deals !DT:THD! damage and apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

DTMod:Cover.NAME: Cover
DTMod:Cover.DESCRIPTION: The ragontaer:Rear gains NL !B! Block. NL Draw !M! cards.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: The ragontaer:Rear gains NL !DT:THB! Block. NL Draw !M! cards.

DTMod:Hide.NAME: Hide
DTMod:Hide.DESCRIPTION: The ragontaer:Front gains NL !B! Block. NL Next turn, draw !M! cards.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: The ragontaer:Front gains NL !DT:THB! Block. NL Next turn, draw !M! cards.

DTMod:Threaten.NAME: Threaten
DTMod:Threaten.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Dragon gains !DT:THB! Block and apply !M! Weak.

DTMod:BurningEnergy.NAME: Burning Energy
DTMod:BurningEnergy.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E]. NL Add a Burn into your discard pile.
DTMod:BurningEnergy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] [E]. NL Add a Burn into your discard pile.

DTMod:BizarreTactic.NAME: Bizarre Tactic
DTMod:BizarreTactic.DESCRIPTION: You gain !B! Block. NL Whenever Dragon is attacked this turn, deal !M! damage back.

DTMod:DarkBreath.NAME: Dark Breath
DTMod:DarkBreath.DESCRIPTION: Do twice: Dragon deals !DT:THD! damage and apply !M! Weak.

DTMod:PurifyingFlame.NAME: Purifying Flame
DTMod:PurifyingFlame.DESCRIPTION: Dragon deals NL !DT:THD! damage. NL Remove all debuffs from Dragon. NL Exhaust.

DTMod:ForkedFlame.NAME: Forked Flame
DTMod:ForkedFlame.DESCRIPTION: Repeat X times: Dragon deals !DT:THD! damage to two random enemies.

DTMod:Astonish.NAME: Astonish
DTMod:Astonish.DESCRIPTION: The ragontaer:Rear deals damage equal to !M! times the ragontaer:Aggro difference.

DTMod:DaggerTrick.NAME: Dagger Trick
DTMod:DaggerTrick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X+1 times. This attack does not increase ragontaer:Aggro.

DTMod:TauntingStrike.NAME: Taunting Strike
DTMod:TauntingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Choose one: Deal !D! damage; or Dragon deals !DT:THD! damage. NL The attacker ragontaer:Taunts the enemy for 1 turn.

DTMod:BurningForce.NAME: Burning Force
DTMod:BurningForce.DESCRIPTION: Dragon deals NL !DT:THD! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage for every Burn created this combat.

DTMod:MaximumCharge.NAME: Maximum Charge
DTMod:MaximumCharge.DESCRIPTION: Dragon deals NL !DT:THD! damage. NL Dragon gains NL !M! Vulnerable.

DTMod:SneakAttack.NAME: Sneak Attack
DTMod:SneakAttack.DESCRIPTION: Only usable if You are the ragontaer:Rear. NL Deal !D! damage 4 times.

DTMod:LastStand.NAME: Last Stand
DTMod:LastStand.DESCRIPTION: You gain !B! Block. NL For this turn, You receive half damage from attacks. NL Exhaust.

DTMod:DeepFocus.NAME: Deep Focus
DTMod:DeepFocus.DESCRIPTION: After 2 turns, NL gain !M! Strength. NL ragontaer:Channeling.

DTMod:GhostSkin.NAME: Ghost Skin
DTMod:GhostSkin.DESCRIPTION: Dragon gains NL !M! Intangible. NL If Dragon is the ragontaer:Front, it loses 5 Dexterity. NL Exhaust.

DTMod:Observe.NAME: Observe
DTMod:Observe.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain [E] for every !M! cards in your draw pile.

DTMod:Shift.NAME: Shift
DTMod:Shift.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL The ragontaer:Rear gains NL !M! ragontaer:Aggro. NL Exhaust.
DTMod:Shift.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Choose one: NL You or Dragon gains NL !M! ragontaer:Aggro. NL Exhaust.

DTMod:Coolant.NAME: Coolant
DTMod:Coolant.DESCRIPTION: Scry !M!. NL Exhaust any Status or Curse cards revealed.

DTMod:Haste.NAME: Haste
DTMod:Haste.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E]. NL Play a random Power from your hand. NL Exhaust.
DTMod:Haste.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E]. NL Play a random Power from your hand. NL Exhaust.

DTMod:RedScale.NAME: Red Scale
DTMod:RedScale.DESCRIPTION: Dragon gains !DT:THB! Block. NL Add a *Hard *Skin into your hand.
DTMod:RedScale.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Dragon gains !DT:THB! Block. NL Add a *Hard *Skin+ into your hand.

DTMod:TagTeam.NAME: Tag Team
DTMod:TagTeam.DESCRIPTION: The ragontaer:Front gains NL !B! Block. NL Gain !M! ragontaer:Bonding. NL If your team ragontaer:Switched this turn, effects are doubled.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: The ragontaer:Front gains NL !DT:THB! Block. NL Gain !M! ragontaer:Bonding. NL If your team ragontaer:Switched this turn, effects are doubled.

DTMod:Overwhelm.NAME: Overwhelm
DTMod:Overwhelm.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL All enemies lose HP equal to 3 times their Weak.

DTMod:WarmUp.NAME: Warm-Up
DTMod:WarmUp.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw !M! additional card.
DTMod:WarmUp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, draw !M! additional card.

DTMod:ShadowImage.NAME: Shadow Image
DTMod:ShadowImage.DESCRIPTION: Whenever You or Dragon attacks, the attacker gains !M! Block.

DTMod:DoubleTeam.NAME: Double Team
DTMod:DoubleTeam.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever your team ragontaer:Switch, gain [E].

DTMod:Dissolve.NAME: Dissolve
DTMod:Dissolve.DESCRIPTION: Add 2 Burns into your hand. NL At the end of your turn, Dragon gains NL !M! Block.

DTMod:InvisibleFlame.NAME: Invisible Flame
DTMod:InvisibleFlame.DESCRIPTION: Whenever the ragontaer:Front attacks, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

DTMod:Arbitration.NAME: Arbitration
DTMod:Arbitration.DESCRIPTION: Whenever your team ragontaer:Switch, apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

DTMod:Inferno.NAME: Inferno
DTMod:Inferno.DESCRIPTION: Dragon deals NL !DT:THD! damage to ALL enemies. Shuffle a Burn into your draw pile for each enemy.

DTMod:RecklessFlurry.NAME: Reckless Flurry
DTMod:RecklessFlurry.DESCRIPTION: Choose the attacker. NL The attacker loses all Block and deal twice that much to ALL enemies.

DTMod:RecklessFlurryDragon.NAME: Attacker: Dragon
DTMod:RecklessFlurryDragon.DESCRIPTION: Dragon deals NL !DT:THD! damage to ALL enemies.

DTMod:HuntersMark.NAME: Hunter's Mark
DTMod:HuntersMark.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever Dragon attacks this enemy, gain 1 ragontaer:Bonding. Exhaust.

DTMod:LightShield.NAME: Light Shield
DTMod:LightShield.DESCRIPTION: You gain !B! Block. NL Dragon gains !DT:THB! Block. NL Gain !M! additional Block for every ragontaer:Bonding you gained this combat.
DTMod:LightShield.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: You gain !B! Block. NL Dragon gains !DT:THB! Block. NL Gain !M! additional Block for every ragontaer:Bonding you gained this combat.

DTMod:StunTrap.NAME: Stun Trap
DTMod:StunTrap.DESCRIPTION: After 2 turns, Stun the enemy and draw !M! cards. NL ragontaer:Channeling. NL Exhaust.

DTMod:GearUp.NAME: Gear Up
DTMod:GearUp.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! *Safety and *Hard *Skin into your hand. NL Exhaust.
DTMod:GearUp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add !M! *Safety+ and *Hard *Skin+ into your hand. NL Exhaust.

DTMod:Safeguard.NAME: Safeguard
DTMod:Safeguard.DESCRIPTION: The ragontaer:Rear no longer loses Block at the start of your turn.

DTMod:BattleHarmony.NAME: Battle Harmony
DTMod:BattleHarmony.DESCRIPTION: Whenever both You and Dragon attack in a single turn, gain !M! ragontaer:Bonding.
DTMod:BattleHarmony.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever both You and Dragon attack in a single turn, gain !M! ragontaer:Bonding.

DTMod:ResonanceForm.NAME: Resonance Form
DTMod:ResonanceForm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL When only one of your team gains Strength, Dexterity or Block, the other gains a copy of it.
DTMod:ResonanceForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When only one of your team gains Strength, Dexterity or Block, the other gains a copy of it.

DTMod:FierySynthesis.NAME: Fiery Synthesis
DTMod:FierySynthesis.DESCRIPTION: Dragon deals NL !DT:THD! damage. NL While in your deck, ALL potions become ragontaer:Blaze_Potion.

DTMod:TurnBack.NAME: Turn Back
DTMod:TurnBack.DESCRIPTION: The ragontaer:Rear gains NL !B! Block. NL Draw a card. NL Startup: Play this card.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: The ragontaer:Rear gains NL !DT:THB! Block. NL Draw a card. NL Startup: Play this card.

DTMod:BondingBonus.NAME: Bonding Bonus
DTMod:BondingBonus.DESCRIPTION: You get one of these effects when you gain 4 Bonding.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Draw cards until your hand is full.
Play the top 3 cards of your draw pile.
